title: Record of Muwui’s Battles - Novel Updates
author: Gauri   가우리
description:
A mysterious encounter.

It’s an amazing thing.

Everyone wishes that they would have one, but no one ever manages to get one. This is what a mysterious encounter is.

That’s what it’s supposed to be, but…

Sometimes, that same encounter could be a curse for some.

Like me, for example.

“Fuck…”>
